verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,
<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> put <S%H2330>forth<s%> a <S%H2420>riddle,<s%> and <S%H4911>speak<s%> a <S%H4912>parable<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

and <S%H559>say,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> A <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5404>eagle<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3671>wings<s%> and long <S%H83>feathers,<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5133>feathers,<s%> which had various <S%H7553>colors,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6788>top<s%> of the <S%H730>cedar:<s%>

he cropped <S%H6998>off<s%> the <S%H7218>topmost<s%> of the young <S%H3242>twigs<s%> of <S%H935>it,<s%> and carried it to a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>traffic;<s%> he <S%H7760>set<s%> it in a <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H7402>merchants.<s%>

He <S%H3947>took<s%> also of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H5414>planted<s%> it in a <S%H2233>fruitful<s%> <S%H7704>soil;<s%> he <S%H3947>placed<s%> it beside <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters;<s%> he <S%H7760>set<s%> it as a willow <S%H6851>tree.<s%>

It <S%H6779>grew,<s%> and became a <S%H5628>spreading<s%> <S%H1612>vine<s%> of <S%H8217>low<s%> <S%H6967>stature,<s%> whose <S%H1808>branches<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> toward <S%H8328>him,<s%> and its roots were under <S%H1612>him:<s%> so it became a vine, and brought <S%H6213>forth<s%> <S%H905>branches,<s%> and <S%H7971>shot<s%> forth <S%H6288>sprigs.<s%>

There was also <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5404>eagle<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3671>wings<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5133>feathers:<s%> and <S%H1612>behold,<s%> this vine <S%H3719>bent<s%> its <S%H8328>roots<s%> toward <S%H7971>him,<s%> and shot forth its <S%H1808>branches<s%> toward <S%H6170>him,<s%> from the beds of its <S%H4302>plantation,<s%> that he might water <S%H8248>it.<s%>

It was <S%H8362>planted<s%> in a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7704>soil<s%> by <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> that it might bring <S%H6213>forth<s%> <S%H6057>branches,<s%> and that it might <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> that it might be a <S%H155>goodly<s%> <S%H1612>vine.<s%>

<S%H559>Say,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> Shall it <S%H6743>prosper?<s%> shall he not pull <S%H5423>up<s%> its <S%H8328>roots,<s%> and cut <S%H7082>off<s%> its <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> that it may <S%H3001>wither;<s%> that all its fresh <S%H6780>springing<s%> <S%H2964>leaves<s%> may <S%H3001>wither?<s%> and not by a <S%H1419>strong<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%> or <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> can it be <S%H5375>raised<s%> from its <S%H8328>roots.<s%>

<S%H8362>Yes,<s%> behold, being planted, shall it <S%H6743>prosper?<s%> shall it not <S%H3001>utterly<s%> <S%H3001>wither,<s%> when the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> <S%H3001>it?<s%> it shall wither in the <S%H6170>beds<s%> where it <S%H6780>grew.<s%>
Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H559>Say<s%> now to the <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3045>Don't<s%> you know what these things <S%H559>mean?<s%> tell <S%H4428>them,<s%> Behold, the king of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> its <S%H4428>king,<s%> and its <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to him to <S%H894>Babylon:<s%>

and he <S%H3947>took<s%> of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H4410>royal,<s%> and <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H935>him;<s%> he also brought him under an <S%H423>oath,<s%> and <S%H935>took<s%> away the <S%H352>mighty<s%> of the <S%H776>land;<s%>
that the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> might be <S%H8217>base,<s%> that it might not lift itself <S%H5375>up,<s%> but that by <S%H8104>keeping<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> it might <S%H5975>stand.<s%>

But he <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against him in <S%H7971>sending<s%> his <S%H4397>ambassadors<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> that they might <S%H5414>give<s%> him <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%> Shall he <S%H6743>prosper?<s%> shall he <S%H4422>escape<s%> who <S%H6213>does<s%> such <S%H6565>things?<s%> shall he break the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and yet <S%H4422>escape?<s%>

As I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> surely in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where the <S%H4428>king<s%> dwells who made him <S%H4427>king,<s%> whose <S%H423>oath<s%> he <S%H959>despised,<s%> and whose <S%H1285>covenant<s%> he <S%H6565>broke,<s%> even with him in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> he shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>

Neither shall <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> with his <S%H1419>mighty<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%> and <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>company<s%> <S%H6213>help<s%> him in the <S%H4421>war,<s%> when they cast <S%H8210>up<s%> <S%H5550>mounds<s%> and <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1785>forts,<s%> to cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5315>persons.<s%>

For he has <S%H959>despised<s%> the <S%H423>oath<s%> by <S%H6565>breaking<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant;<s%> and <S%H5414>behold,<s%> he had given his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and yet has <S%H6213>done<s%> all these <S%H4422>things;<s%> he shall not escape.

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> As I <S%H2416>live,<s%> surely my <S%H423>oath<s%> that he has <S%H959>despised,<s%> and my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that he has <S%H6331>broken,<s%> I will even <S%H5414>bring<s%> it on his own <S%H7218>head.<s%>

I will <S%H6566>spread<s%> my <S%H7568>net<s%> on <S%H8610>him,<s%> and he shall be taken in my <S%H4686>snare,<s%> and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> him to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and will enter into <S%H8199>judgment<s%> with him there for his <S%H4603>trespass<s%> that he has trespassed against <S%H4604>me.<s%>

All his <S%H4015>fugitives<s%> in all his <S%H102>bands<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and those who <S%H7604>remain<s%> shall be <S%H6566>scattered<s%> toward every <S%H7307>wind:<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, have spoken <S%H1696>it.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> I will also <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H7311>lofty<s%> <S%H6788>top<s%> of the <S%H730>cedar,<s%> and will <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6998>it;<s%> I will crop off from the <S%H7218>topmost<s%> of its young <S%H3127>twigs<s%> a tender <S%H7390>one,<s%> and I will <S%H8362>plant<s%> it on a <S%H1364>high<s%> and <S%H8524>lofty<s%> <S%H2022>mountain:<s%>

in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H4791>height<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will I <S%H8362>plant<s%> <S%H5375>it;<s%> and it shall bring forth <S%H6057>boughs,<s%> and <S%H6213>bear<s%> <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> and be a <S%H117>goodly<s%> <S%H730>cedar:<s%> and under it shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> all <S%H6833>birds<s%> of every <S%H3671>wing;<s%> in the <S%H6738>shade<s%> of its <S%H1808>branches<s%> shall they <S%H7931>dwell.<s%>

All the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, have brought <S%H8213>down<s%> the <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> have <S%H1361>exalted<s%> the <S%H8217>low<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> have <S%H3001>dried<s%> up the <S%H3892>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and have made the <S%H3002>dry<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> to <S%H6524>flourish;<s%> <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> and have done <S%H6213>it.<s%>
